description:
“I think I’m gonna like having a dick in my mouth!” Henry said. You could see how excited he was.

“You know, I was expecting it to be scary. But to be honest... I like it!”

“It’s hitting all the right spots... look!!" Jessie pointed down to his dick which was dripping precum. And not just a normal amount... we are talking buckets. It was impressive!

“Magical,” he said. “Kinda got my heart going.”
“What about your first rim job?”
“Perfect! Kinda got my dick hard!”
title: Henry & Jessie: Bareback
